title: Real-time Abnormal Behavior Detection System based on Fast Data
abstract: Recently, there are rapidly increasing cases of APT (Advanced Persistent Threat) attacks such as Verizon(2010), Nonghyup(2011), SK Communications(2011)

citations.title: Design of Multi-Level Abnormal Detection System Suitable for Time-Series Data
